member.name: T:Emergent.Toolbench.UI.Menus.ViewMenuFactory
member.summary: Displays a list of all active views that can be turned on and off based on the current context the user is in.

member.name: M:Emergent.Toolbench.UI.Menus.ViewMenuFactory.AddDummyItem(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem)
member.summary: Adds a hidden menu item to our menu. This prevents it from being automatically disabled by MenuBuilder.
member.param: Menu to receive a dummy item.

member.name: T:Emergent.Toolbench.UI.Menus.ExitAction
member.summary: Menu action for telling the workbench to exit.

member.name: M:Emergent.Toolbench.UI.Menus.ExitAction.Execute(Emergent.Toolbench.Actions.ExecutionContext,Emergent.Toolbench.Actions.ExecutionStyle)
member.param: The execution context of the action.
The execution style of the action.
